name: Dr Jessica Symons
quote: I just used Claude Code to create an new version of a Unity project that had been gathering dust for years. Is was so satisfying to see it rise again. Thank you thank you John for setting me up. I am having so much fun üôè thanks üôè.

name: James Harrison
quote: In one day, we built an AI agent that now handles 40% of our customer queries. The hands-on approach meant I left with something real, not just slides.

name: Elena Rodriguez
quote: The residential programme gave us space to think differently. By day three, we'd prototyped three AI tools that are now core to our client offering.
location_detail: Lake District retreat with fell views
